name: YogaStudio
0:
”Alexa, open yoga studio”
”Alexa, start yoga studio”
”Alexa, ask yoga studio for a fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: yoga studio
des:
Ask Alexa to "Open Yoga Studio" or "Start Yoga Studio" to get an effective yoga practice in five minutes or less! Each pose is introduced with both english and sanskrit names with guidance for arriving at the position, tips for posture and technique, and guidance for breathing. 

Alexa will select two poses at random to start your yoga routine. If you wish to practice an extra pose say, "move to the next". At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill.

This skill was created by Left Layne using a Skill Blueprint. We appreciate your patience as we gradually expand our pose library. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
